Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot

Visualizers based on scatterplots.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScatterplotVisualization
    Default class to handle 2D projected visualizations.
    AbstractTooltipVisualization
    General base class for a tooltip visualizer.
    AxisVisualization
    Generates a SVG-Element containing axes, including labeling.
    AxisVisualization.Factory
    Factory for axis visualizations
    MarkerVisualization
    Visualize e.g. a clustering using different markers for different clusters.
    MarkerVisualization.Factory
    Visualization factory
    PolygonVisualization
    Renders PolygonsObject in the data set.
    PolygonVisualization.Factory
    The visualization factory
    ReferencePointsVisualization
    The actual visualization instance, for a single projection
    ReferencePointsVisualization.Factory
    Generates a SVG-Element visualizing reference points.
    ToolBox2DVisualization
    Renders a tool box on the left of the 2D visualization
    ToolBox2DVisualization.Factory
    Factory for visualizers for a toolbox
    TooltipScoreVisualization
    Generates a SVG-Element containing Tooltips.
    TooltipScoreVisualization.Factory
    Factory for tooltip visualizers
    TooltipScoreVisualization.Factory.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    TooltipStringVisualization
    Generates a SVG-Element containing Tooltips.
    TooltipStringVisualization.Factory
    Factory
